metadata.name: Baby Machine
metadata.description: Cattle by Thecla. With simple forms and figures, the work addresses complex personal and feminist themes. The female character in the work is sexy, free and colorful. But she is also vulnerable and raw. She expresses the emotional road of liberation through body movements, like a choreography. All items are unique and hand drawn. Each NFT represents a physical artwork that takes on different forms, such as acrylic paintings, digital prints on glass, sculptures and neon lights.
